name: The Spirea
description:
The Spirea Hobo is the epitome of function meets luxury. This bag will take its place as your favorite accessory for all occasions. Its perfect for winter with the stylish leather outer. Soft hemp/organic cotton linen lines the pockets and interior.

The Spirea handbag is the ultimate in organization. Don't lose anything in the bottom of this bag. Built with an outside zippered welt pocket and seam pocket; plus, 3 inner pockets and a clip for your keys. 

It is built ultra sturdy with reinforced stitching and very roomy to carry your heaviest of books. Heavy-duty webbing and stainless steel hardware make up the 2 straps for this bag. It comfortably fits a laptop. Plus, just the showy elegance needed for a night out in the city. With extended use, the wear of the bag only gets better. It works into being your favorite.

Measures:

Body: 18" tall x 15" wide. (45 cm x 38 cm)
Drop of Webbing Strap: 15+ inches from shoulder to handbag.
